pullRequest.title: Create Common Library add-on
pullRequest.bodyText:
Move the project sharedutils to an add-on to allow any ZAP add-on to
use/depend on it and to avoid duplicating the classes/resources/libs in
all of them.
Make classes that are not intended to be extended final and make some
fields private final.
Change BinList to a singleton and let it be accessed directly.
Add minimal help.
Remove SetCookieUtils, a subset of CookieUtils.
Add JavaDoc to some classes/methods and add since JavaDoc tag.
The add-on will be published to Maven Central with the following
group/id:

Group: org.zaproxy.addon;
Id: commonlib (same as the add-on ID).

Update add-ons that were already using the sharedutils project to
use/depend on the add-on.

nodes.bodyText: Does it really matter for this add-on? Should be changed to release?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,128 @@
+import org.zaproxy.gradle.addon.AddOnStatus
+
+plugins {
+    `maven-publish`
+    signing
+}
+
+group = "org.zaproxy.addon"
+
+version = "0.1.0"
+description = "A common library, for use by other add-ons."
+
+zapAddOn {
+    addOnName.set("Common Library")
+    addOnStatus.set(AddOnStatus.ALPHA)

nodes.bodyText: This is using the version that was in the sharedutils project, should we bump to 2.9.0?
Some classes lack JavaDoc, should we document all of them?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,128 @@
+import org.zaproxy.gradle.addon.AddOnStatus
+
+plugins {
+    `maven-publish`
+    signing
+}
+
+group = "org.zaproxy.addon"
+
+version = "0.1.0"
+description = "A common library, for use by other add-ons."
+
+zapAddOn {
+    addOnName.set("Common Library")
+    addOnStatus.set(AddOnStatus.ALPHA)
+    zapVersion.set("2.9.0")
+
+    manifest {
+        author.set("ZAP Dev Team")
+
+        helpSet {
+            baseName.set("help%LC%.helpset")
+            localeToken.set("%LC%")
+        }
+    }
+}
+
+dependencies {
+    zap("org.zaproxy:zap:2.7.0")
+
+    implementation("commons-io:commons-io:2.6")
+    implementation("org.apache.commons:commons-csv:1.8")
+    implementation("org.apache.commons:commons-collections4:4.4")
+
+    testImplementation(project(":testutils"))
+}
+
+
+val sourceSets = extensions.getByName("sourceSets") as SourceSetContainer
+
+tasks.register<Jar>("javadocJar") {

nodes.bodyText: Happy to revert these changes (just wanted to make BinList a singleton and thus default constructor private).

beforeCommit.message:
Create Common Library add-on

Move the project `sharedutils` to an add-on to allow any ZAP add-on to
use/depend on it and to avoid duplicating the classes/resources/libs in
all of them.
Make classes that are not intended to be extended final and make some
fields private final.
Change `BinList` to a singleton and let it be accessed directly.
Add minimal help.

The add-on will be published to Maven Central with the following
group/id:
 - Group: `org.zaproxy.addon`;
 - Id: `commonlib` (same as the add-on ID).

Update add-ons that were already using the `sharedutils` project to
use/depend on the add-on.

Signed-off-by: thc202 <thc202@gmail.com>
